name: Minecraft Server
short_description: Open-source sandbox game server with endless possibilities.
description: Open-source sandbox game server with endless possibilities. Minecraft Server is a self-hosted application focused on gaming, server, self-hosted, homelab. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Minecraft Server on your home server to open-source sandbox game server with endless possibilities without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Minecraft Server to manage your gaming workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
